title: Otona no 1 Page Shinrigaku
original_name: おとなの 1 ページ心理学
sinopse:
This gag manga follows the humorous stories of the quirky doctors in the psychiatry department of a medical college. Each short joke story lasts about 1-2 pages. Interspersed with the short stories are funny psychological quizzes with explanations for each answer.

(Source: MangaHelpers)
